text: Olsen Orekewa FilipainaFILIPAINA, Olsen Orekewa 1977 - 86 - Kiwi #529 nzleague.co.nz (23 April 1957 â€“ 10 February 2022) was a professional rugby league footballer. He represented both New Zealand and Western Samoa. He played for New Zealand from 1977 until 1986. He was born in Kaikohe, New Zealand. During the 1980s, Filipaina played club competition in Australia for three Sydney-based clubs. He played for the Balmain Tigers, Eastern Suburbs and North Sydney Bears. After his playing career ended, he continued to live in Sydney. Filipaina died on 10 February 2022 in Westmead, Sydney, from kidney failure. He was 64. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:New Zealand rugby league players
title: Olsen Filipaina
